item.title: Autodesk Fusion Signup
item.description: Signed up for the free personal edition of Autodesk Fusion 360, and got stuck signing into it the first time on macOS because it refused to create a new team for me. Solution is to quit Fusion 360, go to the Fusion Team Signup page, create a team there, then restart Fusion 360. I found the solution in a forum post from 2019, so I’m not holding my breath waiting for Autodesk to fix it.
